VIII.i.3.C.1.c
.
Example 1: When Additional Development Is Not Necessary for a Spina Bifida Claim
Situation
:
A child of a Veteran who served only during the Gulf War applies for spina bifida benefits.
Action
:  Send a denial letter
without
developing for the nature of the disability or relationship evidence.
Rationale
:  It is immediately apparent that the parent of the claimant cannot meet Vietnam or specific Korean service requirements for Chapter 18 benefits.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C - Eligibility and Development
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C
